font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 使荒废： to bring into a condition of decay or partial ruin
【例】 The house has been dilapidated by neglect
【近】 ruin, wreck
【反】 be in use 还在使用；restore 恢复使用；mend, repair 修理；rejuvenate, renew, renovate 翻新
